Posts.EditableText: Has there been a recent change to the forum. I have noticed over the last few days that all the game Categories/Tags are displayed in 2 lines at the top of the forum pages. Is there a setting I can change to get it back to how it was? Or did something go wrong while updating the site?

Posts.EditableText:
Hello R2T1

Effectively, it has been updated, including categories at the top of the web to make them more accessible, even on mobile devices. In the next few days we will adjust this functionality until it is in its final state.

In principle it is not configurable by the user and as I say we will adjust in the coming days, when we have enough data we will see if we keep them in their original place or they happen to be in the upper part as they are now. Do not you think it's right to show up in that place?
